option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera" android:required="false" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CAMERA" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.AppCompat.Light.DarkActionBar" tools:targetApi="31" android:usesCleartextTraffic="true"> <!-- Important for HTTP testing if API is not HTTPS -->
<activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="true" android:label="@string/app_name" android:theme="@style/Theme.AppCompat.Light.DarkActionBar"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name=".AbListActivity" android:exported="false"/> <activity android:name=".ABTestingActivity" android:exported="false"/>
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera" android:required="false" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CAMERA" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.AppCompat.Light.DarkActionBar" tools:targetApi="31" android:usesCleartextTraffic="true"> <!-- Important for HTTP testing if API is not HTTPS -->
<activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="true" android:label="@string/app_name" android:theme="@style/Theme.AppCompat.Light.DarkActionBar"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name=".AbListActivity" android:exported="false"/> <activity android:name=".ABTestingActivity" android:exported="false"/> <activity android:name=".MachineLogActivity" />
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent"> <LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<EditText android:id="@+id/edtStaffNo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Thợ (StaffNo)" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/edtMcName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Mã máy (McName)" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/edtJobNo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="CTCViec (JobNo)" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/edtProOrdNo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="LSX (ProOrdNo)" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/edtSerial" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Số series" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSubmit" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Submit" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnScan" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Scan" /> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnAbTesting" android:layout_width="201dp" android:layout_height="204dp" android:text="ABTesting" /> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnAbTesting" android:layout_width="201dp" android:layout_height="204dp" android:text="ABTesting" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnMachineLog" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Nhật ký máy" /> </LinearLayout>
